text: The Union Dutchwomen represented Union College in ECAC women's ice hockey during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. == Recruiting == {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- style="" | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Hannah Erickson || Forward || || Played with North American Hockey Academy |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Erica Kelly || Forward || || Attended King's-Edgehill School |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Caitlin McLaren || Defense || || Played with the Ottawa Lady Senators |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Alexx Ridding || Goaltender || || Former Goalie with Barrie Jr. Sharks |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Nicole Russell || Forward || || Played for Detroit Honeybaked |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Brandy Streeter || Defense || || Played with the Buffalo Bison |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} == 2014–15 Dutchwomen == ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style=""| Regular Season ==References== Union Category:Union Dutchwomen ice hockey seasons
